body.description: An aromatic and refreshing shaving cream for wet shaving that leaves the skin smooth and refreshingly fragrant. Gentle on the skin, it contains protective beeswax and glycerin. This cream can be used sparingly and creates a rich creamy lather for a soothing and comfortable shave.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #65,263 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #119 in Men's Shaving Creams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave cream ever (for me)
reviews.reviewText: I love this cream. I just put a bit on my hand, pat my hands together, and then rub on my beard. I don't see any need for a brush/mug. It goes on easy. I get a more gentle and smoother shave than I have had with any other brand/type. It is not the cheapest. It goes a pretty good ways for me. Super slick. I don't find it gums up my razor if I keep it rinsed well.Update: I just reordered two more tubes of this shave cream. It IS the best shave cream I have ever used. I have a relatively coarse beard and need to shave every morning if I want to have a clean face, which has nothing to do with this cream. It provides as close a shave as any other cream I have ever used.A little bit does indeed go a long way for me. It is super slick. As someone else said, I use about a dime size (tube thick). It doesn't lather up much. I'm not sure what that matters actually. As slick as it is I don't need it. And it washes off clean and fairly quickly. It has a subtle scent which is different than I have ever smelled before. I find it nice and it doesn't really smell after I dry off. I am not a shave cream snob as (no offense intended) some others seem to be. They like their rituals and if that works for them, great. I don't use a shave cream brush. I just put the small amount in my palm and use a couple of fingers from the other hand to mash it up and then apply. It also will not gum up my blades as I have seen with some other foamy creams. I guess I am giving it a rave review, and I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great. Close shaves. Soft skin.
reviews.reviewText: Love this cream. Speick has a spicy fragrance, similar to lavender but better. Best with a brush. Makes good lather that allows close, comfortable shaves.Does not leave my skin tight or dry. Loved ones around comment on how good I smell after a shave with Speick. Of dozens I’ve tried, Speick is in my top 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent enough, but it didn't work well for me
reviews.reviewText: Speick is a decent shaving cream. Good lubrication, builds good foam. But the scent is peppery / spicy which some may not like. And while it was up there with Proraso or Musgo for shaving, when lathering my face it I found it a bit irritating - itchy and some facial burn. When rinsed, the burn went away and there was no lasting irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very slick. A delight to shave with.
reviews.reviewText: Very good lather and quick to whip up. It's not cheap to use but very good stuff. Not a thirsty soap at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new must-have for me
reviews.reviewText: I bought a tube of this particular Speick product while in Germany late last year, you know, before the Pandemic when travel was fine. Not wanting to take too many liquids or gels, I bought this on arrival.This is the best shave cream in my experience, seriously. I'm actually a beard person, but I still shave to keep it trim. Combined with a badger-hair brush for lathering, this cream foams wonderfully and shaves cleanly. Unlike most American products, Speick does not overload their products with perfume or unnecessary ingredients. This has a lavender scent that is subtle and not unpleasant. Also, I use only about a 1/2" ribbon of cream for each shave, with more than enough lather created for the entire shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There really is no analogue to Speick. Performs well, a relaxing scent, and leaves no residue. Quality ingredients. I have enjoyed every Speick product that I have purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent & lather!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to lather. Smells great. No nicks. Added to my wet shave rotation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slick and smooth
reviews.reviewText: This shave cream makes a nice lather and works great.
Zapach ziołowy - kwestia gustu - mnie się podoba .Sprawdza się jak większość popularnych marek , które są jednak tańsze

reviews.reviewTitle: Buon prodotto sia per protezione che per lubrificazione.
reviews.reviewText: Il prodotto è di grande qualità. Lo trovo adatto per i viaggi, visto il peso contenuto. Il profumo di lavanda è gradevole. La schiuma prodotta dal pennello (con una quantità di acqua non eccessiva) è abbondante e densa e protegge bene la pelle. La qualità che più si apprezza è la lubrificazione: una volta passato il rasoio, la pelle non si secca ma rimane scivolosa. Questo permette di ripassare la lama senza che s’inceppi. Unico neo: la crema da barba è contenuta in un tubo di alluminio, che forse nel trasporto in valigia risente un po’ troppo degli urti. Non però tanto da rompersi.
Una crema muy interesante con aroma a flores alpinas. Hace menos espuma que otras pero más que suficiente. La piel la deja muy bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: This one is the best so far
reviews.reviewText: Been trying lots of different shaving creams.Including the Grooming Lounge Beard Destroyer.This one is the best so far.Do yourself a favour and use a good quality brush for application .It will last a lot longer which justifies the price.
J'utilise cette crème quand je voyage, elle est pratique, de très bonne qualité, et plus agréable que les savons à raser.
